meanings.definition: Happening or carried on according to chance rather than design or inherent nature.
meanings.sent1: The adventitious meeting with an old friend at the store made my day.
meanings.sent2: The adventitious rain shower caught us off guard during our picnic.
meanings.sent3: It was adventitious that I found a dollar in my old jacket pocket.
meanings.sent4: The adventitious arrival of the circus in our small town brought joy to everyone.
meanings.sent5: The adventitious discovery of a rare flower in the garden amazed us all.

meanings.definition: Coming from outside; not native or inherent.
meanings.sent1: The adventitious plants in the garden added a unique touch to the landscape.
meanings.sent2: The adventitious bird species had migrated to the area due to the changing climate.
meanings.sent3: It was adventitious that the foreign exchange student arrived just in time for the school play.
meanings.sent4: The adventitious flavors of the international cuisine delighted our taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The adventitious noise from the street disrupted the peaceful atmosphere of the library.
